text: Growling is a low, guttural vocalization produced by predatory animals. Growling or growl may also refer to: ==Sounds== * Borborygmus, the medical term for the noise sometimes heard from the stomach * Death growl, the dominant singing style in death metal music * Growling (wind instruments) a wind instrument (for example, saxophone) technique ==Other uses== * Growl (software), a global notifications system for the Mac OS X and Windows operating systems * Growl (video game), a 1990 arcade game by Taito Corporation * Growl (album), a 2008 album by Radioactive Man * "Growl" (song), a 2013 song by South Korean–Chinese boy band Exo * "Growl", song by Johnny Kidd And The Pirates 1959 ==See also== * Growler (disambiguation)
title: Growling (disambiguation)
